grape.embiggen.utils.graph_to_sparse_tensor package¶

Submodules¶

grape.embiggen.utils.graph_to_sparse_tensor.graph_to_sparse_tensor module¶

Module contents¶

Returns provided graph as sparse Tensor.

param graph

The graph to convert.

type graph

Graph,

param use_weights

Whether to load the graph weights.

type use_weights

bool,

raises ValueError,

If the weights are requested but the graph does not contain any.

raises ValueError,

If the graph contains singletons.

raises ValueError,

If the graph is a multigraph.

returns

rtype

SparseTensor with (weighted) adjacency matrix.

GraPE
